attributes.action: order ! order ! order an initiative on post - traumatic stress disordered staff !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please debrief the armed forces before repatriatating trained soldiers into civilian life - last week I was hit in the face in a brawl. Also I think this would be a good professional and supportive initiative for staff in emergency services.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
